Changelog
=========

2.1 (2019-02-06)
----------------

- Add support for Python 3 and PyPy.


2.0 (2017-10-19)
----------------

Backwards incompatible changes
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

* Update to beautifulsoup4.

* Add a parameter ``parser`` to ``SoupStrainer`` which specifies the parser
  used by beautifulsoup4.


1.0 - 2008-11-14
----------------

* Initial release
